title: Help, stuck on the reconnect screen.
body: I was queued up for a ranked game, and i think they disabled the ranked queue in the middle of my champ select. The champ select proceeded to finish and I can't connect to the game nor can I exit reconnect the screen. I've attempted to restart my client several times and it remains the same. Is anyone else getting this problem or is there a solution?

replies.body: Was just stuck in the champ select of a normal blind pick and everyone had locked in, game was about to begin, never did.  2 people reconnected and got back into chat, i tried to reconnect and now i login it asks me to reconnect to the game in progress, but if i click reconnect nothing happens - now i guess i get to enjoy the leaver buster queue on the house.
Sigh, mine was my last promo match, it would suck if i got the ban hammer. Hope riot can at the least put on loss prevented.
